description:
Germany is considering deporting migrants to Rwanda, where it could use asylum facilities paid for by the U.K., after Keir Starmer scrapped the scheme on which the U.K. has already spent at least £318 million.

The post Germany Could Adopt Rwanda Plan Paid for by U.K. appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Germany Could Adopt Rwanda Plan Paid for by U.K.

description:
India presents itself as a beacon of democracy and makes grand statements about protecting minorities. But the increasingly fanatical religious leadership is driving Hindu sectarianism around the world, says Aditya A.

The post India is Fuelling Hindu Sectarianism Around the World appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: India is Fuelling Hindu Sectarianism Around the World

description:
Teacher Joe Baron says it's no surprise 18 to 24 year-olds are so unpatriotic. They've been taught by woke history teachers to hate their own country.

The post With Teachers Like These, no Wonder British Youngsters Are so Unpatriotic appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: With Teachers Like These, no Wonder British Youngsters Are so Unpatriotic

description:
France and Britain need a "showdown" over Channel migrants because of Britain's lax approach to black market work, the mayor of Calais has said, after at least 12 migrants died on Tuesday when their crammed dinghy sank.

The post France and U.K. Need “Showdown” Over Channel Crossings Because of Britain’s Lax Labour Laws, Calais Mayor Demands appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: France and U.K. Need “Showdown” Over Channel Crossings Because of Britain’s Lax Labour Laws, Calais Mayor Demands

description:
Ed Miliband has just agreed to pay 58% more for renewable energy and barefacedly claimed it will lower bills. The Government's green agenda is based on lies upon lies upon lies upon lies, says Ben Pile.

The post Ed Miliband Has Sold British Energy Consumers to the Lowest Bidder (And Dares to Call it a “Success”) appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Ed Miliband Has Sold British Energy Consumers to the Lowest Bidder (And Dares to Call it a “Success”)

description:
We still haven't learnt the lessons from the Grenfell fire, says Margaret Rothwell. To stop it happening again, we need intelligent alarms, second staircases, firemen's lifts and the retrofitting of sprinklers.

The post We Still Haven’t Learnt the Lessons From the Grenfell Fire appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: We Still Haven’t Learnt the Lessons From the Grenfell Fire

description:

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

title: News Round-Up
